__e: Remember when I first came back from the hospital with Lisa, and you couldn t stop checking up on her, to see she was OK?
You didn't want me to take a body with someone in it. And I made sure that the spirit was gone.
I looked out to see if my car was back and saw you kissing a guy.
Well, last time I checked, this isn't war, and I'm not a soldier, but Stefan is one of the best people that I know, and when it comes to saving his life, yes, I will do just about anything--
And the last time I checked, you were the last one feeling sorry about it.
It's not exactly me, or you, the last time I checked.
